MAN.TITLE: xgetmouse
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get the mouse events and current position

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : integer. If present, the mouse click event queue is not cleared when entering xgetmouse.
: boolean vector [getmotion, getrelease]. default value is [%t, %f]

DESCRIPTION.P:
If the mouse pointer is located in the current graphics window, xgetmouse returns in rep the current pointer position (x,y) and the value ibutton.
The ibutton value indicates the event type:

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==0
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been pressed

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==1
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been pressed

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==2
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been pressed

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==3
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==4
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==5
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==10
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been double-clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==11
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been double-clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==12
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been double-clicked

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==-5
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Left mouse button has been released

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==-4
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Middle mouse button has been released

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton==-3
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : Right mouse button has been released

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton > =32
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(ibutton) has been pressed

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton < =-32
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(-ibutton) has been released

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: ibutton > =1000+32
DESCRIPTION_ITEM.SP: : key with ascii code ascii(ibutton-1000) has been pressed while CTRL key pressed

MAN.EXAMPLE: xselect(); xbasc(); xsetech([0 0 1 1],[0 0 100 100]) xset("alufunction",6) xtitle(" drawing a rectangle ") [b,x0,y0]=xclick(); rep=[x0,y0,-1]; x=x0; y=y0; xrect(x0,y0,x-x0,y-y0) while rep(3)==-1 then rep=xgetmouse(0) xrect(x0,y0,x-x0,y0-y) x=rep(1); y=rep(2); xrect(x0,y0,x-x0,y0-y) end xset("alufunction",3)
